title: Ukraine Says It Sank Two Russian Naval Boats, as New Blasts Hit Russian Border Area - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Ukraine Says It Sank Two Russian Naval Boats, as New Blasts Hit Russian Border Area  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Ukrainian drone destroys two Russian patrol ships, says defense ministry  CNN
  3. Ukraine releases video of 2 Russian ships allegedly being destroyed in Black Sea  Fox News
  4. Video shows Ukrainian drone destroying Russian patrol ship off Snake Island, defense ministry says  CBS News
  5. Russian boats sunk by Ukraine drone strikes near Snake Island  USA TODAY
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Ukraine said it sank the boats in the Black Sea with drone strikes, as explosions rang out once again in Russiaâ€™s border region of Belgorod and heavy fighting continued in eastern Ukraine. Ukrainian authorities Monday began welcoming civilians evacuated from Mariupol.
